title: Georgia Tech Professor Laurie Garrow Offers 5 Tips for Airline Travel This Summer | News Center - Georgia Tech News Center
content: Georgia Tech Professor Laurie Garrow Offers 5 Tips for Airline Travel This Summer | News Center  Georgia Tech News Center
description: Book early and check often. Many airlines have waived their exchange fees, so if the price of a ticket goes down after booking, you can exchange it and use the cost difference as a future flight credit.  Check before you drive. Airports are among the hardest hit by labor shortages.
